{"title": "123s for Little Children", "title_search": "123s for little children", "title_keyword": "123s for little children", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/123s-for-little-children/", "summary": "123s for Little Children is a simple number sequence game for children of pre-school age and older.   Starting by simply counting up from 1, it helps to build a child's confidence with numbers laying the foundation for later schoolwork.  No reading ability is required to play the games and the child can choose his or her own path through the games at whatever pace they like.  The 31 games include counting in twos, threes, fives and tens. They also include "fill in the gap" games to strengthen a child's knowledge.   Number sounds - up to 100 - spoken in english by children are included to allow a child to associate written numbers with number names.  The visual menu system allows the game to be navigated without having to read, so individual games can be found simply by looking and touching.  The complete list of games:  Simple Counting 1) Counting up from 1 - 1, 2, 3, 4, … 2) Counting in twos - 2, 4, 6, 8, … 3) Counting in threes - 3, 6, 9, 12, … 4) Counting in fives - 5, 10, 15, 20, … 5) Counting in sevens - 7, 14, 21, 28, … 6) Counting in tens - 10, 20, 30, 40, …  Filling in the gaps 7) Fill in the gaps counting up 8) Fill in the gaps counting down  Tricky Counting 9) Odd numbers - 1, 3, 5, 7, … 10) Counting up from different starting points - e.g. 6, 7, 8, 9, …   11) Counting down from different starting points - e.g. 12, 11, 10, 9, … 12) Mixed counting up or down from different starting points  Counting Down 13) Counting down to 1 - … 4, 3, 2, 1 14) Counting down in twos - … 8, 6, 4, 2 15) Counting down in threes - … 12, 9, 6, 3 16) Counting down in fives - … 20, 15, 10, 5 17) Counting down in sevens - … 28, 21, 14, 7 18) Counting down in tens - … 40, 30, 20, 10 19) BLASTOFF - Counting down to zero  Other Counting Steps Preparing for Times Tables 20) Counting in fours - 4, 8, 12, 16, … 21) Counting in sixes - 6, 12, 18, 24, … 22) Counting in eights - 8, 16, 24, 32, … 23) Counting in nines - 9, 18, 27, 36, … 24) Counting in elevens - 11, 22, 33, 44, … 25) Counting in twelves - 12, 24, 36, 48, …  Counting Up High 26) Counting from 1 to 100 27) Counting from 1 to 200 28) Counting from 1 to 500 29) Counting from 1 to 800 30) Counting from 1 to 1000 31) Counting from 1 to 2000", "genre": ["Edutainment"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-12-06", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-174579-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-174579-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Xenosoft Limited (Publisher)", "Xenosoft Limited (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
